name: Fundação Oceano Azul
goal: Our Mission is to contribute to a healthy and productive ocean to the benefit of our planet.
interests: Education and training, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives: Oceano Azul Foundation has taken since the UN Conference, since its beginning, an active participation in this event, which has granted financing the participation of Small Island Developing States representatives in the Conference and the presentation, alongside Oceanário de Lisboa, of a set of Voluntary Commitments, in order to grant more sustainability to the ocean. These commitments are composed by events and initiatives in Azores, in Marine Protected Areas an literacy programs concerning the sea, among others, and their are aligned with the mission of Oceano Azul Foundation, that includes raising awareness and building capacity for ocean sustainability, in a time of such great threats.
